org.la4j.matrix

Interface Matrix

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DenseMatrix, SparseMatrix
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBasicMatrix, AbstractCompressedMatrix, AbstractMatrix, AbstractSafeMatrix, Basic1DMatrix, Basic2DMatrix, CCSMatrix, CRSMatrix, DenseSafeMatrix, SparseSafeMatrix

    public interface Matrix
extends Externalizable
    This interface represents real matrix.

    http://mathworld.wolfram.com/Matrix.html

      • power

        Matrix power(int n)
        Power operation for matrices. Matrix is returned to the power of n. This function uses the Exponentiation by squaring method.
        Parameters:
        n - The exponent
        Returns:
        Exponentiated matrix

      • power

        Matrix power(int n,
           Factory factory)
        Power operation for matrices. Matrix is returned to the power of n. This function uses the Exponentiation by squaring method.
        Parameters:
        n - The exponent
        factory - Factory for this matrix
        Returns:
        Exponentiated matrix

      • decompose

        @Deprecated
Matrix[] decompose(MatrixDecompositor decompositor)
        Deprecated. 
        Decomposes this matrix.

        This method is deprecated. Use the following instead:

        Matrix a = new Basic2DMatrix(...);
        MatrixDecompositor decompositor = a.withDecompositor(LinearAlgebra.DecompositorFactory.LU);
        Matrix[] lup = decompositor.decompose(LinearAlgebra.DENSE_FACTORY);

        Parameters:
        decompositor -

      • decompose

        @Deprecated
Matrix[] decompose(MatrixDecompositor decompositor,
                            Factory factory)
        Deprecated. 
        Decomposes this matrix with decompositor and factory.

        This method is deprecated. Use the following instead:

        Matrix a = new Basic2DMatrix(...);
        MatrixDecompositor decompositor = a.withDecompositor(LinearAlgebra.DecompositorFactory.LU);
        Matrix[] lup = decompositor.decompose(LinearAlgebra.DENSE_FACTORY);

        Parameters:
        decompositor -
        factory -

      • inverse

        @Deprecated
Matrix inverse(MatrixInverter inverter)
        Deprecated. 
        Inverts this matrix.

        This method is deprecated. Use the following instead:

        Matrix a = new Basic2DMatrix(...);
        MatrixInverter inverter = a.withSmartInverter();
        Matrix b = inverter.inverse();

        Parameters:
        inverter -
